name: Uncle Waffles
description: '''Lungelihle Zwane''' (born 30 March 2000) known professionally as '''Uncle Waffles''', is a [[Swazi people|Swazi]] DJ and record producer based in South Africa. She is noted for her work in the [[amapiano]] genre and her dance abilities, with ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' describing her as the "princess of amapiano". Her debut single,"Tanzania", reached number one in South Africa, where it is certified [[Music recording certification|7Ã— platinum]].
